tasks.title: Improve ML signal generator with advanced models
tasks.description: Enhance the existing ML-based signal generator by experimenting with more advanced models (e.g., LSTM, XGBoost) and hyperparameter tuning. Use the engineered features from previous steps. Evaluate model performance with cross-validation and update the signal generator code in workspace/.

tasks.title: Develop additional trading strategies (mean reversion, momentum)
tasks.description: Create and backtest at least two new trading strategies (e.g., mean reversion and momentum-based) using the optimized backtest engine. Ensure strategies are compatible with the paper trading system and include risk parameters. Save strategy code and backtest results in workspace/.

tasks.title: End-to-end integration test of trading pipeline
tasks.description: Integrate all components (data download, feature calculation, signal generation, backtesting, paper trading) into a single pipeline and run an end-to-end test. Identify and fix any integration issues. Create a main orchestration script that runs the full trading loop and outputs performance metrics.

tasks.title: Optimize backtest engine for large-scale historical data
tasks.description: Profile and optimize the backtest engine to handle large-scale historical data (e.g., multiple years, multiple assets) efficiently. Focus on memory usage and execution speed. Use existing profiling tools and implement improvements like vectorization or parallel processing.

tasks.title: Integrate advanced risk management into paper trading
tasks.description: Integrate the advanced risk management module into the paper trading system. Ensure that risk rules (position sizing, stop-loss, etc.) are applied during simulated trades. Update the paper trading system to log risk metrics and validate risk constraints in real-time.

tasks.title: Enhance ML signal generator with ensemble/deep learning models
tasks.description: Improve the ML-based signal generator by implementing ensemble methods (e.g., Random Forest, Gradient Boosting) or deep learning models (LSTM/Transformer) to increase prediction accuracy. Integrate with existing feature pipeline and backtest engine.

tasks.title: Develop dynamic position sizing module for paper trading
tasks.description: Create a module that adjusts trade sizes based on real-time risk metrics (volatility, correlation, account equity). Integrate with the advanced risk management system to optimize capital allocation.

tasks.title: Implement real-time performance analytics dashboard
tasks.description: Extend the monitoring dashboard to include live charts of P&L, Sharpe ratio, drawdowns, and trade execution metrics. Use WebSocket streams for real-time updates from the paper trading system.

tasks.title: Build stress testing framework for backtest engine
tasks.description: Develop a framework to simulate extreme market conditions (flash crashes, high volatility periods) and assess strategy robustness. Integrate with the optimized backtest engine for large-scale data.

tasks.title: Integrate paper trading with simulated live market data feed
tasks.description: Connect the paper trading system to a real-time market data feed (e.g., Forex/stock simulated stream) to test execution latency and order matching logic in a live-like environment.

tasks.title: Enhance ML signal generator with reinforcement learning
tasks.description: Build and integrate a reinforcement learning model (e.g., PPO, DQN) into the ML signal generator to enable adaptive trading decisions based on market feedback. Use the existing engineered features and backtest engine for training. Save the model to workspace/ and update the signal generation pipeline.

tasks.title: Implement market regime detection for strategy switching
tasks.description: Develop a module to detect market regimes (trending, ranging, volatile) using statistical methods or ML clustering. Integrate this with the paper trading system to dynamically switch between the developed strategies (mean reversion, momentum, SMA crossover) based on the detected regime. Update paper_trading_system.py.

tasks.title: Build a strategy backtesting and comparison dashboard
tasks.description: Create an interactive web dashboard (using Streamlit or similar) that allows users to run backtests on different strategies with various parameters, compare performance metrics (Sharpe, max drawdown), and visualize equity curves. Integrate with the existing backtest engine and save the dashboard in workspace/.

tasks.title: Implement model performance monitoring and drift detection
tasks.description: Extend the real-time monitoring dashboard to track the performance of live ML models (signal generators). Add alerts for model drift, significant prediction error spikes, or feature distribution shifts. Integrate with the existing alert_manager.py and dashboard.py.

tasks.title: Implement A/B testing framework for ML signal generators
tasks.description: Build a system to compare performance of different ML signal generators (ensemble, deep learning, reinforcement learning) against baseline strategies. Create metrics dashboard and statistical significance tests to determine which model performs best in different market regimes.

tasks.title: Optimize paper trading execution with real-time market microstructure
tasks.description: Enhance the paper trading system to simulate realistic market microstructure including order books, bid-ask spreads, slippage, and latency. Integrate with the simulated live market data feed for more accurate execution modeling.

tasks.title: Build performance benchmarking suite for backtest engine
tasks.description: Create comprehensive benchmarking tests to measure backtest engine performance across different data sizes, asset classes, and strategy complexities. Include memory usage, execution time, and accuracy metrics compared to reference implementations.

tasks.title: Implement automated anomaly detection for system monitoring
tasks.description: Extend the monitoring system to automatically detect anomalies in trading performance, model predictions, and system metrics. Create alerting rules and automated diagnostics to identify issues before they impact trading.

tasks.title: Develop disaster recovery and failover mechanisms
tasks.description: Design and implement disaster recovery procedures for critical system components including database backups, model versioning, and failover to secondary systems. Create automated recovery playbooks and test scenarios.

tasks.title: Implement production-ready model serving API for ML signals
tasks.description: Containerize the best-performing ML signal generator model and deploy it as a REST API endpoint. The API should accept market data (OHLCV) and return trading signals. Include model versioning, health checks, and load balancing. The goal is to replace the current batch processing with real-time inference for the paper trading system.

tasks.title: Integrate live trading broker API with paper trading system
tasks.description: Extend the paper trading system to connect to a real broker's sandbox/paper trading API (e.g., Alpaca, Interactive Brokers). Implement order placement, cancellation, and portfolio sync. Ensure it works with the existing execution simulation and risk management modules. This creates a bridge to eventual live trading.

tasks.title: Build distributed backtest optimization engine
tasks.description: Scale the backtest engine to perform parallel parameter optimization across multiple assets and time ranges. Implement using a framework like Ray or Dask. The system should efficiently search strategy parameters (e.g., SMA windows, stop-loss levels) and output optimized configurations for the strategy dashboard.

tasks.title: Implement automated system remediation for critical failures
tasks.description: Enhance the monitoring and alerting system to automatically trigger remediation actions. Examples: auto-restart failed services, roll back to a stable model version if drift is detected, or scale cloud resources based on latency thresholds. Integrate with the existing CI/CD and disaster recovery mechanisms.
